Description: The following statement contains a magic number: try              {                  buf = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(8192);                  // This is a hacktastic way of getting sysname from uname ()                  if (uname(buf) == 0)                  {                      return Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi(buf);                  }              }              finally              {                  if (buf != IntPtr.Zero)                      Marshal.FreeHGlobal(buf);              }
